set.name: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each other light creature you have in the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Race
property.value: Light Bringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be put into your graveyard from the battle zone, add it to your shields face down instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Return a card from your mana zone to your hand. ■ After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Return a spell from your mana zone to your hand.

property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When this creature would be put into your graveyard from the battle zone, add it to your shields face down instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Initiates. ■ Each of your other light creatures in the battle zone has "blocker". (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a creature that has "blocker" to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Race
property.value: Starlight Tree

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While all the cards in your mana zone are light cards, this creature has "Blocker (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)"

property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Add a card from your hand to your shields face down.

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Cluster

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ While all the cards in your mana zone are water cards, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return 2 cards from your mana zone to your hand. Then your opponent chooses 2 cards in his mana zone and returns them to his hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a creature in the battle zone that has power 2000 or less and return it to its owner's hand. (Return the creature to its owner's hand before your opponent can block with it.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a water card from your deck, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Type

property.name: Rules

property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at your opponent's hand and shields. Then put the shields back where they were.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all water cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each other darkness creature you have in the battle zone.

property.value: DM-03 Rampage of the Super Warriors

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.) ■ Choose one of your shields and put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You can cast this spell only if all the cards in your mana zone are fire cards. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" gets +4000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)
